Package index

Main Functions

Core functions for data visualisation

to_index()
Convert a numeric series to an index with a chosen base year
compare_trends()
Compare two time series on a base-100 index scale (quarterly)
run_housepack()
Launch the HousePack Shiny App

Datasets

income_pc
Quarterly Household Disposable Income per Capita (Australia)
detached_full
Detached House Price Index by State (Australia)
cgt_full
Average Capital Gains (1985–2023)
